nodes.text: Chuundar's bowcaster was an enhanced Wookiee bowcaster owned by Chuundar. It was specially modified by Czerka Corporation to use special upgrades, as a result of Chuundar's alliance with Czerka slavers. Revan took it when he killed Chuundar with the help of Zaalbar, Chuundar's brother and Freyyr, Chuundar's father, during the Rebellion on Kashyyyk.
In Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic, if the player decides to have Revan side with Chuundar, it is impossible to obtain the bowcaster.
